title: Unable to Add Mastery Page
body:
On the new client, I can no longer add mastery pages. I went into a game and after tried to see if i could add a page, also I had tried many other ways; going to the store first then going back, exiting client then reopening, tried logging into another computer and same thing happened.
But when I go to the old client I am able to add them right away. I'm not sure if it is a bug or just a fluke, but I thought it should be mentioned.

replies.body: You can access and edit *Mastery Pages* under the **COLLECTION** tab in the New Client. If you're still experiencing issues creating Mastery pages after visiting your collection, let me know.

Yes, I am still having problems. From what I have read so far, it is a common problem that, from what I have read, is being fixed by riot (you guys) already and to just use the legacy client to add mastery pages. But yes it's still not letting me make a new mastery page.

I'm not aware of any bugs with this. Are you seeing an error when trying to make a new mastery page? Can you possibly record what happens or [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) so I can see what's going on?

Ok, I used to be able to add a mastery page by the drop down and just click add a new one, but now there is a plus next to deleting a mastery page. So I am able to add one now. Thank you for your support. I had no idea that it was there. Sorry for troubling you.
